name: The Gods Command You Obey
story_text: You speak with the voice of your saint, commanding your enemies.

low.conditions: before taking the target makes a free strike against a target you choose

mid.conditions: before taking the target uses an ability of your choice and you choose any targets for that ability

high.conditions: before taking the target shifts up to their speed to a location you choose uses an ability of your choice and you choose any targets for that ability
